thumb.name: You Mean So Much Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ENotecard Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your cards on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E
